description: Resource represents an address to a file (a locator). The value is an URI that can represent an absolute or relative path.
title: Resource
$comment: According Platform Industrie 4.0. Details of Asset Administration Shell (Version 3.0) Part 1 Release Candidate 02

path.title: Path
path.description: Path and name of the resource (with file extension). The path can be absolute or relative.

contentType.title: Content type
contentType.description: Content type of the content of the file. The content type states which file extensions the file can have.
